requirements.summary: Re-attempt the previous build and deployment with no code changes
acceptanceCriteria: The application builds successfully without errors.
The deployed app is accessible and all previously implemented features remain functional.

file_operations.description: Verify the root component still correctly handles authentication state, approval checks, and profile setup gating before rendering the TanStack Router-based authenticated app. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure the routing and auth flow remain intact after retry.

Verify the application entry point correctly mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure the app initialization remains correct after retry.

Verify the social feed page correctly renders posts, filters, and the post creation dialog with image upload support. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure all previously implemented features remain functional after retry.

Verify the events page correctly displays upcoming and past events with the create event dialog. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure event functionality remains intact after retry.

Verify the user profile page correctly shows avatar, role badge, posts, and registered events tabs with the edit dialog. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure profile features remain functional after retry.

Verify the admin panel page correctly checks permissions and renders TenureManagement and RoleAssignmentPanel components. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure admin functionality remains intact after retry.

Verify the sidebar navigation correctly shows role-gated nav links and current user profile info. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure navigation remains functional after retry.

Verify the sticky header correctly displays the logo, menu toggle, and notification bell dropdown. No changes required — this is a verification pass to ensure header functionality remains intact after retry.
